Summary: Westbound Bx5 stop on E 163rd St at Southern Blvd is closed
Description:
Westbound Bx5 stop on E 163rd St at Southern Blvd is closed
For westbound service, use the stops on Bruckner Blvd at Bronx River Ave or Southern Blvd at Aldus St instead.

Eastbound buses are also detouring but no stops are missed.

Buses detour via Tiffany St and Southern Blvd. Please allow additional travel time.

See a map of the detour.

What's happening?
Road construction

You may see a few extra turns, but no stops will be missed.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be available/accurate while buses are detoured.
